name: Orange Glazed Swordfish
author: Robyn Webb
summary: Tangy and delicious! Preparation time: 10 minutes. This recipe is from The WEBB Cooks, articles and recipes by Robyn Webb, courtesy of the American Diabetes Association.
directions: In a non-reactive shallow dish, combine the swordfish with the orange juice, ginger, sesame oil, and soy sauce and marinate for 30 minutes
Prepare an outside grill with an oiled rack set 6 inches above the heat source
Grill the swordfish for 6 to 7 minutes per side until the swordfish is opaque in the center
In a small bowl,  mix together the cornstarch with the water
Place the reserved marinade in a saucepan and bring to a boil
Add the cornstarch sauce to the marinade and cook 1 minute until thickened
Serve the orange sauce with the swordfish
